alert.note: Alert for Alcona (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:44AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Alcona, Arenac, southeastern Ogemaw and Iosco Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Selkirk to near Sterling to near Rhodes. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oscoda, East Tawas, Tawas City, Standish, Au Gres, Sterling, Harrisville, Au Sable, Glennie, Long Lake, South Branch, Maple Ridge, Mikado, Whittemore, Lincoln, Omer, Twining, Turner, Tawas Point State Park and Plainfield Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
